descriptions.fiction: Stories, narratives, poems, character descriptions, worldbuilding, roleplay scenarios
descriptions.persuasive_writing: Blog posts, speeches, essays, opinion pieces, arguments, comparative analysis — writing that tries to convince, evaluate, or argue a position
descriptions.content_generation: Lists, names, descriptions, specs, schedules, plans, chat responses, structured content — utilitarian writing without narrative or argument
descriptions.knowledge_qa: Factual questions, explanations, definitions, how-things-work, advice, general knowledge
descriptions.coding: Writing, debugging, or explaining code, software tasks
descriptions.math: Math problems, proofs, calculations, statistics, logic puzzles
descriptions.summarization: Condensing, summarizing, paraphrasing, or outlining existing text
descriptions.harmful_request: Requests for dangerous, illegal, unethical, or policy-violating content
